title: UFO whistleblower claims Trump was 'fully briefed' on evidence of non-human intelligence
description: A former Air Force major turned whistleblower has claimed President Trump now has the information to change the entire world if he chooses to disclose what the US knows about alien life.

title: Joe Rogan Warns UFO Whistleblowers Need Amnesty Or Truth Will Stay Buried Forever
description: Joe Rogan warns UFO whistleblowers need amnesty to prevent secrets from remaining buried, revealing claims of underwater craft, back engineering, and government cover-ups.

title: Exploring UFO religions and human search for meaning
description: What drives people to believe in the unbelievable? UFO religions and the human search for meaning take centre stage at College of the Rockies’ next...

title: Polymarket Bets Spike On Talk Of Trump Releasing UFO Files
description: Under the rules, the contract resolves only if the US government officially releases previously classified documents, videos or reports relating to UFOs.

title: Trump to declassify UFO files in 2025? Spike in Polymarket betting odds sparks speculation
description: Buzz over a possible Trump move to release UFO files surged as Polymarket odds spiked, driven by a trader aggressively betting “Yes” on 2025 declassification.
